OpenLayers. Marker

Instances of OpenLayers.Marker are a combination of a OpenLayers.LonLat and an OpenLayers.Icon.

Summary
OpenLayers. Marker
Instances of OpenLayers.Marker are a combination of a OpenLayers.LonLat and an OpenLayers.Icon.
Properties
icon
{OpenLayers.Icon}
lonlat
{OpenLayers.LonLat} location of object
events
{<OpenLayers.Events>}
map
{OpenLayers.Map}
Functions
OpenLayers. Marker
draw
Calls draw on the icon, and returns that output.
moveTo
Move the marker to the new location.
onScreen
{Boolean} Whether or not the marker is currently visible on screen.
inflate
setOpacity
Change the opacity of the marker by changin the opacity of its icon
display
Hide or show the icon
defaultIcon
Creates a default OpenLayers.Icon.

{OpenLayers.Icon}

{OpenLayers.LonLat} location of object

draw

draw: function(px)

Calls draw on the icon, and returns that output.

Parameters

px{OpenLayers.Pixel}

Return

{DOMElement} A new DOM Image with this marker’s icon set at the location passed-in

setOpacity: function(opacity)

Change the opacity of the marker by changin the opacity of its icon

Parameters

Creates a default OpenLayers.Icon.

This class represents a longitude and latitude pair
Instances of OpenLayers.Map are interactive maps embedded in a web page.
